com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class FileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.FileController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin/file")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class FileController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects and object of File class for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuriy Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    File, FileService, CacheMVFabric

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CacheMVFabric fabric
      The implementation of the interface provides a set of standard methods for creates and returns the main modelAndViews for admins.
      private FileService fileService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the File class.

      • addFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addFile(@RequestParam(value="title")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile multipartFile,
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Adds new file and redirects by url /admin/file/all. Request mapping: /admin/file/add Method: POST
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new file.
        multipartFile - a multipart file of the new file.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.

      • addFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=GET)
public void addFile()
                                                                         throws org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException
        The method throws an exception in the case of reference to it. The exception sender: "GET method in "/admin/file/add" is not supported!" Request mapping: /admin/file/add Method: POST
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.
